short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get youtube summaries by chatgpt injected automatically if the video has a transcript!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Requires an openai free/plus account. No api key needed.

6/12/23 - Auto summarize longer transcripts
6/3/23 - Now supports more language options for summary.
